name: Shine India Foundation

address: AA-1, Vasundhra Vihar, Bajrang Nagar, Kota, Raj-01

briefDescription: Shine India Foundation is one of Kota’s largest volunteers based non-governmental organization.Shine India Foundation is a registered, non-profit, public charitable trust working towards its objective of ‘Helping People Help Themselves’ by making the disadvantaged self-reliant and thereby enabling them to lead a life of dignity.
